Impact Technology is a fast growing, technology service firm focused on building strong partnerships with our clients and our candidates.  We have the experience and background to support a wide variety of technology needs and compete effectively against much larger firms due to our recruiting expertise.  Impact continues to exceed expectations for our clients and has received the following awards:Ranked as the 85th fastest growing private company by Inc. Magazine - 2016#2 Fastest Growing Company in Arizona according to Inc. Magazine - 2016Ranked #1 Technical Placement Firm by Ranking Arizona - 2016When engaging IMPACT, you will have the full benefit of working with an aggressive, yet conscientious, partner that will not be satisfied until we have exceeded your expectations. Our business philosophy, combined with our state-of-the-art technology and depth of experience, make us a powerful partner – one who will help you gain a significant edge in today’s competitive business world.
Responsible for driving all sales strategies across Diversified Industries which includes the following segments: RetailPublic Sector and ConsultingTravel and LeisureManufacturing and Logistics
Managing Director over Arizona and Colorado Territories

DISYS is an ISO 9001:2008 certified IT Consulting company with core services in IT Managed Services, IT On-Demand Resourcing and IT Consulting.  We specialize in IT Consulting services within Application Development and Testing, Infrastructure, Business Intelligence and ERP domains. Our vision is to be a global business partner, delivering the highest quality and most consistent services at the best value to clients worldwide. Incorporated in 1994 as a certified Minority Business Enterprise, DISYS has posted an eight-year average of 50% growth per year and currently ranks as the sixth-fastest growing company in the staffing industry. DISYS is headquartered in McLean, Virginia, with offices and delivery locations worldwide in North and South America, Europe, India and other locations across the APAC region.
Built the IT and Engineering services divisions for BEPC Consulting. Responsibilities include identifying and closing new business as well as growing existing business across the US.
Justice Studies with minor in Computer Science

In early 2013, we decided to open the Phoenix market for DISYS.  Fortunately shortly thereafter we made the decision to hire Tim Kirby. Tim has proven to be a very dynamic and engaging sales leader.  His thoughtful approach to business aligns very well with how we prefer to go to market.  Tim's shown in a very short amount of time that he's very capable of delivering value to our clients by leveraging the best that DISYS has to offer.  He's a true relationship driven sales professional who looks out for the client interests first, and keeps an eye on the big picture for DISYS as well. I have a great respect for Tim's leadership style and ability to communicate directly internally and outwards to the market.   I am happy to recommend Tim as a colleague and friend.
